vclaim: Republican congresswoman Lauren Boebert tweeted about House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's whereabouts during the Jan. 6, 2021 Capitol riot.
title: Did Rep. Boebert Tweet About Speaker Pelosi’s Location During Capitol Riot?
subtitle: As rioters broke into the U.S. Capitol. Boebert tweeted: "The Speaker has been removed from the chambers."
author: Dan Evon
